alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 11:41PM CDT until March 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and light freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...North Cass, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin and South Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will mix with or change to freezing drizzle until 3 AM. After 3 AM, precipitation will be all snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass
